posts.post_content:
Hi all.

I have a T206 Red Hindu Rube Geyer (PSA 1) that I am looking to sell. It is a solid looking card and it has a very nice and presentable back. Give me a holler if you are interested. Thank you.

Derek

I was able to get a scan at friends house. The quality is not terrific, and for that I apologize. The card is actually very nice and the back presents great in my opinion. The issue is some light "hair line" or "surface" creases which you see at first glance when looking at the front. Thank you for looking.

Derek
How much are you looking for?
Chris, Thank you so much. I truly appreciate that!
The card is sold. Thank you very much.
